ComicInfo.Summary:
Final issue! After an arduous journey, the monstrous Yeti whose cub Hashtag: Danger stole reaches #Danger Island to fulfill its obsessive mission. PLUS! The washed-up comedian Snelson makes a desperate bid to restart his career on streaming video. EXTRA! Short prose stories, beautifully illustrated.
ContentsHashtag: Danger (Mission 000013) The Cry of Night Is--Sudden Death! (Part 1)Part 2: There Comes Now Raging Fire!Part 3: The Day the Earth Screams!Part 4: Endgame!Snelson: What's the Deal With the Internet?Cruel Hands of FateInfant Commandos
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-29 08:45:45. [CVDB718817] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 16:25:14. [Issue ID 2015985]

ComicInfo.Inker: Chris Giarrusso,Dan Schoeneck,Elliott Mattice,Fred Harper,Fred Harper,Chris Giarrusso
ComicInfo.Title: What's the Deal With the Internet?; The Cry of Night Is--Sudden Death!
